subject: AM Brief: Thu, 31 Oct 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. USD strengthened amid concerns over Moroccan Dirham.

**Key Event Today:** RBA Speech at 13:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Treutel, Streich and Gutmann upgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Aurum defaeco censura concido minus demum arcesso est.
- AFR: Casus valeo curis delectatio trado omnis.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Follow-up: Metz, Kilback and Oberbrunner transition of funds
body:
Dear Thomas,

Good to connect with you last week.

I'm following up on the transition of funds. We require an update by EOD next week for our trustees.

Could you please provide a status update?

Kind regards,
Michael Jones

--
Michael Jones
Portfolio Manager
National Provident Fund
Wellington, New Zealand

body:

subject: Building Update: Scheduled Fire Drill
body:
Dear Occupants,

A scheduled fire drill will be conducted this Monday morning between 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM. All building employees must participate.

Please follow instructions from your floor wardens. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Nathan Wright

--
Nathan Wright
Building Manager
101 Collins Street Management
Level 31, 101 Collins Street, Melbourne VIC 3000
Tel: +61 3 8636 5000
